title: 61 Best Gifts for Women on All Special Occasions in 2025
description: Put the gift card down and get them something they’ll actually love
author: Shoko Wanger, Audrey Lee
excerpt: The best gifts for women signify that you’ve been paying attention all year long. Read on for our top picks, from bags to baubles and home decor
text: The best gifts for the women in our lives should be a celebration of their many facets and hobbies. The next great gift is probably right under your nose if you start thinking back on what lights them up (countless episodes of Barefoot Contessa, that upcoming trip to the Poconos, sampling every kind of Sephora mini, or a well-curated interior vignette maybe). It should accordingly match that energy so they land up with something that not only reflects their personality and interests, but also shows you’ve been paying attention all year long.No matter who you’re shopping for or how elusive their wish lists may be, we’ve compiled a list of curated gift ideas for all sorts of interests to minimize the guesswork on all the occasions that matter (birthdays, Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day, Hanukkah, Christmas, and so on). Our picks run the gamut—from home decor gems to high-tech gadgets, skin-care gift sets to culinary staples— but are still selective enough to feel special during the big unboxing reveal.Our Top Picks for the Best Gifts for WomenThe Cozy Gift: Quince Ribbed Knit Cashmere Throw, $140The Perfect Robe: Boll & Branch Dream Robe, $149The Glassware Gift: Maison Balzac Orange Apéritif Gobelets Set, $100For the Plant Parent: Sutton 15 Self-Watering Pot, $35The Fragrance: Byredo Bal d’Afrique Eau de Parfum, $225The Bauble: Mejuri Mixed Metal Handcrafted Convertible Link Earrings, $138For the Skin-Care Devotee: Laneige Dream Team Trio Gift Set, $23Browse According to Section:Home and kitchen giftsBeauty and wellness giftsAccessories and apparel giftsHome and KitchenQuince Ribbed Knit Cashmere ThrowNo home decor gift guide would be complete without a cozy blanket. Lounging just got a little more luxe thanks to this mid-weight knit number, made from Mongolian cashmere known for its unbeatable softness and warmth.The Sill Olive TreeGifting her a decidedly stylish olive tree helps dress up any bare nook or cranny in a Gwyneth-approved way.Canned Sardines (2024) Linocut by Amy CundallWhy not gift something that speaks to her current hyper-fixation? Perhaps a recent trip to Lisbon that sparked a love for tinned sardines. This fish-themed art print may be right up her alley.Bearaby Organic Cotton NapperConsider a cozy gift for any woman who’s had a rough few months. A weighted blanket that feels like a hug is just what she needs.Cozy Earth Bubble Cuddle BlanketAnother point in favor of blankets being the ultimate gift (or at least the most foolproof): They double as decor. This one is all about texture, showcasing ultra-plush faux fur with a bubble texture for added interest.Needs Pottery Custom Lunch/Snack TrayHere’s a plate that caters to serious snack connoisseurs with a charming illustrated design."Woman Made: Great Women Designers" by Jane HallThis coffee table compendium spotlights over 200 inspiring women in design, from Anni Albers to Ray Eames, Ana Kraš to Florence Knoll.Christina Lundsteen Stripe Bolster PillowCovered in candy-colored stripes, this cotton velvet bolster is childlike joy in textile form. Choose from three color combinations, including raspberry paired with a blush pink that looks almost rose gold in certain lights.Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round Cocotte with Flower LidYou cannot go wrong with Le Creuset cookware. This flower-adorned mini cocotte is a real treat for home cooks, who can use it to make single-serving portions of favorite dishes such as soups, desserts, and breakfast bakes.Sutton 15 Self Watering PotThe base of this attractive ceramic planter contains a self-watering system for the laziest of gardeners among us.Cashmere Throw by RailsIf she's anything like us, “too much cashmere,” isn't a phrase in her vernacular. Think of this throw as an extension of her favorite Rails sweater—equally cozy and very chic.Bearaby Snuggler Heated BottleOr consider the Bearaby aptly named Snuggler, a microwavable weighted bottle designed to alleviate tension and soothe nagging aches, pains, and cramps.Piper Icon Cocktail TrayThis mirrored tray will become the talk of her bar cart. Thanks to the choice of an olive or cherry trim, it’s an especially great gift option if her drink du jour is a martini or a spiked Shirley Temple.Misette Hand-Painted Salad PlateFor your favorite hostess, pick up a salad set to liven up her next dinner party. Alternatively, she can mount the whimsical plates as art and dress up the kitchen wall.Bang & Olufsen Wireless Waterproof Bluetooth SpeakerA gadget that looks good enough to keep on display? This wireless waterproof speaker allows audiophiles a seamless listening experience no matter where they go—from sunbathing in the backyard to belting out tunes in the bath.A Dictionary Of Color Combinations Vol 1This text that was pivotal in contemporary color research will surely become a favorite in her own book collection. Both visually appealing and full of knowledge, it includes 348 color combinations design nerds (like us) can use in their next project."Capri Dolce Vita" by Cesare CunacciaInspire never-ending wanderlust in your favorite traveler with Capri photos and stories centered around this beyond-special island in the Mediterranean.Matouk Cairo Scallop TowelsA pair of Matouk hand towels personalized with her initials will instantly give her bathroom a luxury spa feel.Avocado Vase by Ed Spurr and Amy Hall BrownOne part vase and another part planter, this glass vessel was designed to cradle an avocado pit as it sprouts, making a delightfully unique gift for aspiring green thumbs or anyone who enjoys a low-stakes kitchen experiment. (Whatever your giftee’s level of gardening experience, instructions are included.)Flamingo Estate Night Blooming Jasmine & Damask Rose XL CandleTreat a collector of scented candles to the gift of an extra-long burn. This 26-ounce, triple-wicked beauty from Flamingo Estate—perfumed with jasmine, rose, bergamot, and orange blossom—is estimated to last up to 165 hours. (If candles aren’t her thing, consider these bricklike soaps, in the same intoxicating scent.)Maison Balzac Orange Apéritif Gobelets SetAny drink is made more festive with a Maison Balzac hand-blown tumbler. This giftable duo features tantalizing glass citrus slices affixed to their bases.Gohar World Sea Creatures Mother-of-Pearl Spoons (Set of 2)File these mother-of-pearl spoons under “necessary indulgences.” Shaped like sea creatures and perfectly sized for caviar, they’re luxurious, chic, and just the right amount of cheeky.Cuzen Matcha Maker Starter KitThe perfect gift for any matcha devotee: a countertop machine grinds tea leaves into powder and whisks up a freshly brewed cup in just one click.Alessi Pulcina Stovetop Coffee MakerThis design-forward stovetop coffee maker takes its name—which translates from Italian to “chick”—from the beak-like shape of its anti-drip spout.Alessi Blue MGSAL Salt Castor by Michael GravesMade of thermoplastic resin and high-shine stainless steel, this 1980s Alessi staple is sure to please culinary aesthetes looking to add color and clever design to their kitchen toolkits.Great Jones x Fellow KettleThe Stagg EKG Electric Kettle makes a perfect gift for any pour-over coffee fanatic—especially in this limited-edition colorway, courtesy of a collaboration with Great Jones.Beauty and WellnessPillow by Christina Lundsteen & Anthropologie, Robe by Quince, PJs by Eberjey, Blankets by Quince and Cozy Earth, Eye Mask by Brooklinen, Travel Pouch by Quince, Hand Cream by Le Labo, Catchall by Pottery Barn, Fragrance by Byredo, Necklace by Monica Vinader, Earrings by Mejuri Photography by Lizzie Soufleris, Styled by Adrian AbabovićByredo Bal d’Afrique Eau de ParfumAn homage to the influence of African culture on 1920s Paris, this unisex floral scent, with notes of African marigold, bergamot, violet, and Moroccan cedar, is a surefire choice for fragrance lovers (not to mention travelers, history buffs, and romantics too).Quince 100% Washable Silk Beauty Sleep SetA must-have on any long-haul flight, this sleep set—which includes a silk eye mask, two scrunchies, and a pillowcase—makes a great gift for frequent travelers (and each piece is machine-washable too).The Citizenry Aegean Cotton Bath Towel SetTurn a simple shower into an act of self-care with cotton-linen bath towels that bundle beauty, breathability, and sustainable manufacturing into one very pretty package. (We see you, eyelash fringe.)Boll & Branch Dream RobeWith four-layer organic cotton construction, luxuriously deep pockets, and a roomy, unisex cut, Boll & Branch’s cozy Dream Robe delivers on the promise of its name.Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand BalmSometimes the gift of self-care comes in a chic tube of moisturizing hand cream. All of Aesop’s scents are heavenly, but this balm will wiggle its way right into their regular skin-care routine.Kinto Insulated Travel TumblerAn essential addition to any wellness toolkit, this double-walled stainless-steel water bottle comes in a range of rich shades and keeps drinks hot or cold for up to six hours.La Mer Crème de la MerSkincare enthusiasts of all ages can attest that La Mer’s moisturizer is like youth in a jar. And if she’s any kind of beauty aficionado, she’ll be hoarding this hydrating, brightening cream until the wintertime.Dyson Supersonic Hair DryerIf you’re looking to go all out with our favorite gifts for women, why not gift the gold standard of hair dryers? The TikTok-beloved Dyson Supersonic is designed to protect hair from extreme heat damage and frizz while leaving locks extra smooth and shiny.Le Labo Hinoki Hand PomadeThe plant-based pomade combines skin-care heavy hitters—shea butter, coconut oil, and almond oil—with a woodsy scent inspired by Japanese Buddhist temples.Spring & Mulberry Dark Chocolate Essence Variety PackThese very luxe chocolate bars from Spring & Mulberry are the perfect extras to complement her favorite bottle of wine or elevate a thoughtful gift basket filled with her favorite treats.Bluejay Premiere Edition Electric BikeThis bike can take her from city streets to vacations at The Cape. With a vintage-inspired design, Bluejay's electric cruiser features the latest e-bike technology, which includes a powerful 350-watt mid-drive motor and chargeable battery that lasts over 75 miles.Apple Watch Series 10 GPS 42mmA little something to help her while she's training for that marathon will be greatly appreciated. The Apple watch can make calls, send messages, monitor heart rate, and is water-resistant.Accessories and ApparelDiamond Bezel Station Necklace by Ring ConciergeDiamonds are always a girl’s best friend, as they say—especially when they come strung on a beautiful gold chain she can layer with other prized pieces of jewelry.Birkenstock Arizona Big-Buckle SandalsA new pair of walking shoes, especially the beloved Arizona Birks, will become all-timers—especially if she has an upcoming tropical vacation on the books. These sandals have a slightly elevated silhouette thanks to the statement buckles—meaning she can dress them up or down.J.Crew Brushed Cashmere T-shirtIf you noticed her favorite cashmere tee has gone to the moths, this one from J.Crew layers beautifully under cardigans and jackets.Small Lee Radziwill Calf Hair Shopper by Tory BurchNo matter what she’s wearing, this pony hair crossbody bag will steal the show. It’s also available in an equally eye-catching snakeskin as well as more neutral tones for an everyday option.Prada Aimée Leather Shoulder BagRefresh her accessories closet with Prada’s Aimée shoulder bag, which marries modern and vintage style aesthetics. Drawing inspiration from the ’90s, the soft silhouette looks great slung over-shoulder or worn crossbody.Khaite Simona Shoulder BagThis Khaite showstopper, with python-embossed leather, double straps, and soft suede lining, makes a thoughtful gift for the woman who can’t resist a good animal print.Quince Large Organic Freshwater Cultured Pearl HoopsThese handcrafted hoops offer a whimsical take on a classic silhouette. (Pair with this minimalist diamond bangle if you’re aiming to impress.)Monica Vinader Siren Gemstone Mini NecklaceThis quietly luxurious pendant necklace sets a vibrant emerald against a graceful gold chain—a pairing sure to appeal to jewelry devotees both daring and demure.Mejuri Mixed Metal Handcrafted Convertible Link EarringsChic mixed-metal earrings, featuring 18K gold vermeil and sterling silver, is a worthy addition to any fashion-forward jewelry box.Catbird Tiniest Alphabet StudIn search of personalized gifts—or ideas to commemorate a meaningful life event? Consider Catbird’s recycled gold alphabet studs, which can be mixed and matched, worn in singles or as pairs.Eberjey Inez Washable Silk Printed Long PJ SetThink beyond leggings and oversized sweatshirts. Not only are Eberjey silk pajama sets timelessly chic, but also machine-washable, hypoallergenic, and biodegradable too.Fosvrde Metal Hair PinsThis viral hair hack will help her look more put together between wash days. Bundle it with other hair accessories for good hair days to come.The Comb No. 002She’ll never see a hair out of place with this elegant comb from Crown Affair in her arsenal. Thanks to its slim silhouette it won’t take up too much space in her toiletry bag either.Quince Italian Leather Pouch Travel SetThe jet-setter in your life will be thrilled to pop this two-piece travel gift set into their tote, gym backpack, or weekender. Handmade from 100% Italian leather, it goes miles above and beyond messy Ziploc bag—and its interior is lined in microfiber, which means any spills that do happen can be swiftly wiped away.Kara Yoo Margot Bow Pearl EarringsSweet and sophisticated, this collaborative design from Kara Yoo and Catbird pairs freshwater cultured pearls with sterling silver findings.Yves Saint Laurent Glam Cat Eye SunglassesVintage glamour will never go out of style. Help her channel her inner Italian movie star with perennially chic cat-eye shades.Quince 100% Washable Silk Pajama Long Sleeve TopFive words: Soft, sleek, and machine-washable. A silk pajama top is an example of loungewear gone luxe.Sophie Buhai Fan Shell Hair ClipThe epitome of understated glamor, Sophie Buhai’s tortoiseshell hair clip is a splurge she may not make for herself—but will think of you every time she reaches for it.Loewe Puffer Goya Leather AirPods CaseGift a secure and stylish place to stash her trusty Apple AirPods with this padded leather case, filled with 100% down and finished with a clever magnetic closure.Everywhere Backpack 22LA new gym and travel bag (in this rosy shade of pink), is the perfect surprise since you'll also be whisking her away on that long-awaited getaway in 2025.Shearling Duffle JacketIf her love language is outerwear, surprising her with this shearling coat will make her heart sing. Made of high-quality Turkish shearling, it'll keep her warm during her commute to the office, on impromptu upstate trips, as well as off the slopes at the ski lodge.System Tote 16-inch (Croco)Cuyana’s System Tote in crocodile is a serious work bag for the woman who’s equally serious about her arm candy. This one’s fully customizable thanks to interior snaps that allow you to add and remove organizational accessories (also sold by the brand), including a laptop sleeve, and matching leather pouches that can act as a clutch for post-work outings.Annika Inez Horizontal Spoon PendantThe wildly fashionable chef or hostess in your life will get a kick out of this spoon necklace from St. Agni. Think of it as a striking, but still minimal way to add interest to any outfit.
html:
The best gifts for the women in our lives should be a celebration of their many facets and hobbies. The next great gift is probably right under your nose if you start thinking back on what lights them up (countless episodes of Barefoot Contessa, that upcoming trip to the Poconos, sampling every kind of Sephora mini, or a well-curated interior vignette maybe). It should accordingly match that energy so they land up with something that not only reflects their personality and interests, but also shows you’ve been paying attention all year long.

No matter who you’re shopping for or how elusive their wish lists may be, we’ve compiled a list of curated gift ideas for all sorts of interests to minimize the guesswork on all the occasions that matter (birthdays, Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day, Hanukkah, Christmas, and so on). Our picks run the gamut—from home decor gems to high-tech gadgets, skin-care gift sets to culinary staples— but are still selective enough to feel special during the big unboxing reveal.

Our Top Picks for the Best Gifts for Women

  • The Cozy Gift: Quince Ribbed Knit Cashmere Throw, $140
  • The Perfect Robe: Boll & Branch Dream Robe, $149
  • The Glassware Gift: Maison Balzac Orange Apéritif Gobelets Set, $100
  • For the Plant Parent: Sutton 15 Self-Watering Pot, $35
  • The Fragrance: Byredo Bal d’Afrique Eau de Parfum, $225
  • The Bauble: Mejuri Mixed Metal Handcrafted Convertible Link Earrings, $138
  • For the Skin-Care Devotee: Laneige Dream Team Trio Gift Set, $23

Browse According to Section:

  • Home and kitchen gifts
  • Beauty and wellness gifts
  • Accessories and apparel gifts

Home and Kitchen

Quince Ribbed Knit Cashmere Throw

No home decor gift guide would be complete without a cozy blanket. Lounging just got a little more luxe thanks to this mid-weight knit number, made from Mongolian cashmere known for its unbeatable softness and warmth.

The Sill Olive Tree

Gifting her a decidedly stylish olive tree helps dress up any bare nook or cranny in a Gwyneth-approved way.

Canned Sardines (2024) Linocut by Amy Cundall

Why not gift something that speaks to her current hyper-fixation? Perhaps a recent trip to Lisbon that sparked a love for tinned sardines. This fish-themed art print may be right up her alley.

Bearaby Organic Cotton Napper

Consider a cozy gift for any woman who’s had a rough few months. A weighted blanket that feels like a hug is just what she needs.

Cozy Earth Bubble Cuddle Blanket

Another point in favor of blankets being the ultimate gift (or at least the most foolproof): They double as decor. This one is all about texture, showcasing ultra-plush faux fur with a bubble texture for added interest.

Needs Pottery Custom Lunch/Snack Tray

Here’s a plate that caters to serious snack connoisseurs with a charming illustrated design.

"Woman Made: Great Women Designers" by Jane Hall

This coffee table compendium spotlights over 200 inspiring women in design, from Anni Albers to Ray Eames, Ana Kraš to Florence Knoll.

Christina Lundsteen Stripe Bolster Pillow

Covered in candy-colored stripes, this cotton velvet bolster is childlike joy in textile form. Choose from three color combinations, including raspberry paired with a blush pink that looks almost rose gold in certain lights.

Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round Cocotte with Flower Lid

You cannot go wrong with Le Creuset cookware. This flower-adorned mini cocotte is a real treat for home cooks, who can use it to make single-serving portions of favorite dishes such as soups, desserts, and breakfast bakes.

Sutton 15 Self Watering Pot

The base of this attractive ceramic planter contains a self-watering system for the laziest of gardeners among us.

Cashmere Throw by Rails

If she's anything like us, “too much cashmere,” isn't a phrase in her vernacular. Think of this throw as an extension of her favorite Rails sweater—equally cozy and very chic.

Bearaby Snuggler Heated Bottle

Or consider the Bearaby aptly named Snuggler, a microwavable weighted bottle designed to alleviate tension and soothe nagging aches, pains, and cramps.

Piper Icon Cocktail Tray

This mirrored tray will become the talk of her bar cart. Thanks to the choice of an olive or cherry trim, it’s an especially great gift option if her drink du jour is a martini or a spiked Shirley Temple.

Misette Hand-Painted Salad Plate

For your favorite hostess, pick up a salad set to liven up her next dinner party. Alternatively, she can mount the whimsical plates as art and dress up the kitchen wall.

Bang & Olufsen Wireless Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker

A gadget that looks good enough to keep on display? This wireless waterproof speaker allows audiophiles a seamless listening experience no matter where they go—from sunbathing in the backyard to belting out tunes in the bath.

A Dictionary Of Color Combinations Vol 1

This text that was pivotal in contemporary color research will surely become a favorite in her own book collection. Both visually appealing and full of knowledge, it includes 348 color combinations design nerds (like us) can use in their next project.

"Capri Dolce Vita" by Cesare Cunaccia

Inspire never-ending wanderlust in your favorite traveler with Capri photos and stories centered around this beyond-special island in the Mediterranean.

Matouk Cairo Scallop Towels

A pair of Matouk hand towels personalized with her initials will instantly give her bathroom a luxury spa feel.

Avocado Vase by Ed Spurr and Amy Hall Brown

One part vase and another part planter, this glass vessel was designed to cradle an avocado pit as it sprouts, making a delightfully unique gift for aspiring green thumbs or anyone who enjoys a low-stakes kitchen experiment. (Whatever your giftee’s level of gardening experience, instructions are included.)

Flamingo Estate Night Blooming Jasmine & Damask Rose XL Candle

Treat a collector of scented candles to the gift of an extra-long burn. This 26-ounce, triple-wicked beauty from Flamingo Estate—perfumed with jasmine, rose, bergamot, and orange blossom—is estimated to last up to 165 hours. (If candles aren’t her thing, consider these bricklike soaps, in the same intoxicating scent.)

Maison Balzac Orange Apéritif Gobelets Set

Any drink is made more festive with a Maison Balzac hand-blown tumbler. This giftable duo features tantalizing glass citrus slices affixed to their bases.

Gohar World Sea Creatures Mother-of-Pearl Spoons (Set of 2)

File these mother-of-pearl spoons under “necessary indulgences.” Shaped like sea creatures and perfectly sized for caviar, they’re luxurious, chic, and just the right amount of cheeky.

Cuzen Matcha Maker Starter Kit

The perfect gift for any matcha devotee: a countertop machine grinds tea leaves into powder and whisks up a freshly brewed cup in just one click.

Alessi Pulcina Stovetop Coffee Maker

This design-forward stovetop coffee maker takes its name—which translates from Italian to “chick”—from the beak-like shape of its anti-drip spout.

Alessi Blue MGSAL Salt Castor by Michael Graves

Made of thermoplastic resin and high-shine stainless steel, this 1980s Alessi staple is sure to please culinary aesthetes looking to add color and clever design to their kitchen toolkits.

Great Jones x Fellow Kettle

The Stagg EKG Electric Kettle makes a perfect gift for any pour-over coffee fanatic—especially in this limited-edition colorway, courtesy of a collaboration with Great Jones.

Beauty and Wellness

Byredo Bal d’Afrique Eau de Parfum

An homage to the influence of African culture on 1920s Paris, this unisex floral scent, with notes of African marigold, bergamot, violet, and Moroccan cedar, is a surefire choice for fragrance lovers (not to mention travelers, history buffs, and romantics too).

Quince 100% Washable Silk Beauty Sleep Set

A must-have on any long-haul flight, this sleep set—which includes a silk eye mask, two scrunchies, and a pillowcase—makes a great gift for frequent travelers (and each piece is machine-washable too).

The Citizenry Aegean Cotton Bath Towel Set

Turn a simple shower into an act of self-care with cotton-linen bath towels that bundle beauty, breathability, and sustainable manufacturing into one very pretty package. (We see you, eyelash fringe.)

Boll & Branch Dream Robe

With four-layer organic cotton construction, luxuriously deep pockets, and a roomy, unisex cut, Boll & Branch’s cozy Dream Robe delivers on the promise of its name.

Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm

Sometimes the gift of self-care comes in a chic tube of moisturizing hand cream. All of Aesop’s scents are heavenly, but this balm will wiggle its way right into their regular skin-care routine.

Kinto Insulated Travel Tumbler

An essential addition to any wellness toolkit, this double-walled stainless-steel water bottle comes in a range of rich shades and keeps drinks hot or cold for up to six hours.

La Mer Crème de la Mer

Skincare enthusiasts of all ages can attest that La Mer’s moisturizer is like youth in a jar. And if she’s any kind of beauty aficionado, she’ll be hoarding this hydrating, brightening cream until the wintertime.

Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer

If you’re looking to go all out with our favorite gifts for women, why not gift the gold standard of hair dryers? The TikTok-beloved Dyson Supersonic is designed to protect hair from extreme heat damage and frizz while leaving locks extra smooth and shiny.

Le Labo Hinoki Hand Pomade

The plant-based pomade combines skin-care heavy hitters—shea butter, coconut oil, and almond oil—with a woodsy scent inspired by Japanese Buddhist temples.

Spring & Mulberry Dark Chocolate Essence Variety Pack

These very luxe chocolate bars from Spring & Mulberry are the perfect extras to complement her favorite bottle of wine or elevate a thoughtful gift basket filled with her favorite treats.

Bluejay Premiere Edition Electric Bike

This bike can take her from city streets to vacations at The Cape. With a vintage-inspired design, Bluejay's electric cruiser features the latest e-bike technology, which includes a powerful 350-watt mid-drive motor and chargeable battery that lasts over 75 miles.

Apple Watch Series 10 GPS 42mm

A little something to help her while she's training for that marathon will be greatly appreciated. The Apple watch can make calls, send messages, monitor heart rate, and is water-resistant.

Accessories and Apparel

Diamond Bezel Station Necklace by Ring Concierge

Diamonds are always a girl’s best friend, as they say—especially when they come strung on a beautiful gold chain she can layer with other prized pieces of jewelry.

Birkenstock Arizona Big-Buckle Sandals

A new pair of walking shoes, especially the beloved Arizona Birks, will become all-timers—especially if she has an upcoming tropical vacation on the books. These sandals have a slightly elevated silhouette thanks to the statement buckles—meaning she can dress them up or down.

J.Crew Brushed Cashmere T-shirt

If you noticed her favorite cashmere tee has gone to the moths, this one from J.Crew layers beautifully under cardigans and jackets.

Small Lee Radziwill Calf Hair Shopper by Tory Burch

No matter what she’s wearing, this pony hair crossbody bag will steal the show. It’s also available in an equally eye-catching snakeskin as well as more neutral tones for an everyday option.

Prada Aimée Leather Shoulder Bag

Refresh her accessories closet with Prada’s Aimée shoulder bag, which marries modern and vintage style aesthetics. Drawing inspiration from the ’90s, the soft silhouette looks great slung over-shoulder or worn crossbody.

Khaite Simona Shoulder Bag

This Khaite showstopper, with python-embossed leather, double straps, and soft suede lining, makes a thoughtful gift for the woman who can’t resist a good animal print.

Quince Large Organic Freshwater Cultured Pearl Hoops

These handcrafted hoops offer a whimsical take on a classic silhouette. (Pair with this minimalist diamond bangle if you’re aiming to impress.)

Monica Vinader Siren Gemstone Mini Necklace

This quietly luxurious pendant necklace sets a vibrant emerald against a graceful gold chain—a pairing sure to appeal to jewelry devotees both daring and demure.

Mejuri Mixed Metal Handcrafted Convertible Link Earrings

Chic mixed-metal earrings, featuring 18K gold vermeil and sterling silver, is a worthy addition to any fashion-forward jewelry box.

Catbird Tiniest Alphabet Stud

In search of personalized gifts—or ideas to commemorate a meaningful life event? Consider Catbird’s recycled gold alphabet studs, which can be mixed and matched, worn in singles or as pairs.

Eberjey Inez Washable Silk Printed Long PJ Set

Think beyond leggings and oversized sweatshirts. Not only are Eberjey silk pajama sets timelessly chic, but also machine-washable, hypoallergenic, and biodegradable too.

Fosvrde Metal Hair Pins

This viral hair hack will help her look more put together between wash days. Bundle it with other hair accessories for good hair days to come.

The Comb No. 002

She’ll never see a hair out of place with this elegant comb from Crown Affair in her arsenal. Thanks to its slim silhouette it won’t take up too much space in her toiletry bag either.

Quince Italian Leather Pouch Travel Set

The jet-setter in your life will be thrilled to pop this two-piece travel gift set into their tote, gym backpack, or weekender. Handmade from 100% Italian leather, it goes miles above and beyond messy Ziploc bag—and its interior is lined in microfiber, which means any spills that do happen can be swiftly wiped away.

Kara Yoo Margot Bow Pearl Earrings

Sweet and sophisticated, this collaborative design from Kara Yoo and Catbird pairs freshwater cultured pearls with sterling silver findings.

Yves Saint Laurent Glam Cat Eye Sunglasses

Vintage glamour will never go out of style. Help her channel her inner Italian movie star with perennially chic cat-eye shades.

Quince 100% Washable Silk Pajama Long Sleeve Top

Five words: Soft, sleek, and machine-washable. A silk pajama top is an example of loungewear gone luxe.

Sophie Buhai Fan Shell Hair Clip

The epitome of understated glamor, Sophie Buhai’s tortoiseshell hair clip is a splurge she may not make for herself—but will think of you every time she reaches for it.

Loewe Puffer Goya Leather AirPods Case

Gift a secure and stylish place to stash her trusty Apple AirPods with this padded leather case, filled with 100% down and finished with a clever magnetic closure.

Everywhere Backpack 22L

A new gym and travel bag (in this rosy shade of pink), is the perfect surprise since you'll also be whisking her away on that long-awaited getaway in 2025.

Shearling Duffle Jacket

If her love language is outerwear, surprising her with this shearling coat will make her heart sing. Made of high-quality Turkish shearling, it'll keep her warm during her commute to the office, on impromptu upstate trips, as well as off the slopes at the ski lodge.

System Tote 16-inch (Croco)

Cuyana’s System Tote in crocodile is a serious work bag for the woman who’s equally serious about her arm candy. This one’s fully customizable thanks to interior snaps that allow you to add and remove organizational accessories (also sold by the brand), including a laptop sleeve, and matching leather pouches that can act as a clutch for post-work outings.

Annika Inez Horizontal Spoon Pendant

The wildly fashionable chef or hostess in your life will get a kick out of this spoon necklace from St. Agni. Think of it as a striking, but still minimal way to add interest to any outfit.
